text.24_Tikkunim Mizohar Chadash, 1_Paragraph: One who carefully guards himself against giving in to anger and avoids any arguments, merits that his home is compared to the holy Temple. (Zohar)
text.24_Tikkunim Mizohar Chadash, 0_Paragraph: Three people are especially beloved by G-d: One who does not lose control of his temper, one who does not become drunk, and one who does not demand his full rights.  (Pesachim 113a)
